property.name: sqlType
property.value: SQL

property.name: SQL
property.value: select * from (select rownum numrowasdf, adsfsds.* from (select datstat, vc2ecname, vc2svcname, vc2servcode, vc2pftype, numopid, vc2opname, vc2type, numresponsestatus, vc2reporterrorcode, numprovid, vc2prov, numcnt from tlv_stat_mtinfo_distri where 1=1 #0# order by datstat desc ) adsfsds where rownum < {0}+{1}+1) where numrowasdf > {0}

property.name: SQL
property.value: select count(1) from (select * from tlv_stat_mtinfo_distri where 1=1 #0# order by datstat ) t

property.name: sqlType
property.value: SQL

property.name: SQL
property.value: select * from (select rownum numrowasdf, adsfsds.* from (select datstat, numopid, vc2opname, vc2ecname, numsvcid, vc2servcode, vc2svcname, vc2svctype, vc2type, numpftype, vc2pftype, substr('全国', 0) vc2prov, numresponsestatus, numreportstatus, vc2reporterrorcode, sum(numcnt) numcnt from tlv_stat_mtinfo_distri where 1=1 #0# group by datstat, numopid, vc2opname, vc2ecname, numsvcid, vc2servcode, vc2svcname, vc2svctype, vc2type, numpftype, vc2pftype, substr('全国', 0), numresponsestatus, numreportstatus, vc2reporterrorcode order by datstat desc ) adsfsds where rownum < {0}+{1}+1) where numrowasdf > {0}

property.name: SQL
property.value: select count(1) from ( select datstat, numopid, vc2opname, vc2ecname, numsvcid, vc2servcode, vc2svcname, vc2svctype, vc2type, numpftype, vc2pftype, substr('全国', 0) vc2prov, numresponsestatus, numreportstatus, vc2reporterrorcode, sum(numcnt) numcnt from tlv_stat_mtinfo_distri where 1=1 #0# group by datstat, numopid, vc2opname, vc2ecname, numsvcid, vc2servcode, vc2svcname, vc2svctype, vc2type, numpftype, vc2pftype, substr('全国', 0) , numresponsestatus, numreportstatus, vc2reporterrorcode order by datstat desc ) t

property.name: sqlType
property.value: SQL

property.name: SQL
property.value: select * from (select rownum numrowasdf, adsfsds.* from (select datstat, vc2ecname, vc2svcname, vc2servcode, numopid, vc2opname, vc2type, vc2messagecontent,numcnt, numsuccnt from tlv_stat_mtinfo_content where 1=1 #0# order by datstat desc ) adsfsds where rownum < {0}+{1}+1) where numrowasdf > {0}

property.name: sqlType
property.value: SQL

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select rownum numrowasdf, DATSTAT,VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2OPNAME,VC2TYPE,NUMSUBCNT,NUMCNT,NUMSUCCNT,NUMRATIO From ( SELECT TO_CHAR(DATSTAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATSTAT, VC2SIGNTYPE, VC2TYPE , VC2OPNAME, NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY DATSTAT,VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2TYPE,NUMSUBCNT,VC2OPNAME ) Where rownum <={1} UNION ALL SELECT null numrowasdf, '汇总' DATSTAT, NULL VC2SIGNTYPE, null VC2OPNAME, VC2TYPE,SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY VC2TYPE

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select count(1) From ( SELECT TO_CHAR(DATSTAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATSTAT, VC2SIGNTYPE, VC2TYPE , VC2OPNAME, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY DATSTAT,VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2TYPE,VC2OPNAME )

property.name: sqlType
property.value: SQL

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select rownum numrowasdf, DATSTAT, VC2SIGNTYPE, VC2OPNAME, VC2TYPE, NUMSUBCNT, NUMCNT, NUMSUCCNT, NUMRATIO From (SELECT concat('{0}', '~{1}') DATSTAT, VC2SIGNTYPE, VC2TYPE, VC2OPNAME,SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1 = 1 #0# GROUP BY VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2TYPE,VC2OPNAME) Where rownum <={3} UNION ALL SELECT null numrowasdf, '汇总' DATSTAT, null VC2SIGNTYPE, null VC2OPNAME, VC2TYPE,SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1 = 1 #0# GROUP BY VC2TYPE

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select count(1) From (SELECT concat('{0}', '~{1}') DATSTAT, VC2SIGNTYPE, VC2TYPE, VC2OPNAME, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1 = 1 #0# GROUP BY VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2TYPE,VC2OPNAME)

property.name: sqlType
property.value: SQL

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select rownum numrowasdf, DATSTAT,VC2AREA,VC2TYPE,NUMSUBCNT,NUMCNT,NUMSUCCNT,NUMRATIO From (SELECT TO_CHAR(DATSTAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATSTAT, VC2AREA, VC2TYPE,SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY DATSTAT,VC2AREA,VC2TYPE) Where rownum <={1} UNION ALL SELECT null numrowasdf, '汇总' DATSTAT, null VC2AREA, VC2TYPE,SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY VC2TYPE

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select Count(1) From (SELECT TO_CHAR(DATSTAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATSTAT, VC2AREA, VC2TYPE, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY DATSTAT,VC2AREA,VC2TYPE)

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select rownum numrowasdf,DATSTAT, VC2AREA, VC2TYPE, NUMSUBCNT, NUMCNT, NUMSUCCNT, NUMRATIO From (SELECT concat('{0}', '~{1}') DATSTAT, VC2AREA, VC2TYPE,SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1 = 1 #0# GROUP BY VC2AREA, VC2TYPE) Where rownum <={3} UNION ALL SELECT null numrowasdf, '汇总' DATSTAT, null VC2AREA, VC2TYPE,SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1 = 1 #0# GROUP BY VC2TYPE

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select Count(1) From (SELECT concat('{0}', '~{1}') DATSTAT, VC2AREA, VC2TYPE, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1 = 1 #0# GROUP BY VC2AREA, VC2TYPE)

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select rownum numrowasdf, DATSTAT,VC2AREA,VC2ECNAME,VC2TYPE,VC2SVCNAME,VC2SERVCODE,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE,NUMSUBCNT,NUMCNT,NUMSUCCNT,NUMRATIO From ( SELECT TO_CHAR(DATSTAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATSTAT, VC2AREA, VC2ECNAME, VC2TYPE, VC2SVCNAME, VC2SERVCODE, VC2OPNAME, VC2SIGNTYPE, SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY DATSTAT,VC2AREA,VC2ECNAME,VC2TYPE,VC2SVCNAME,VC2SERVCODE,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE ) Where rownum <={1} UNION ALL SELECT null numrowasdf, '汇总' DATSTAT, null VC2AREA, null VC2ECNAME, null VC2TYPE, null VC2SVCNAME, null VC2SERVCODE, null VC2OPNAME, null VC2SIGNTYPE, SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0#

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select Count(1) From ( SELECT TO_CHAR(DATSTAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATSTAT, VC2AREA, VC2ECNAME, VC2TYPE, VC2SVCNAME, VC2SERVCODE, VC2OPNAME, VC2SIGNTYPE, SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY DATSTAT,VC2AREA,VC2ECNAME,VC2TYPE,VC2SVCNAME,VC2SERVCODE,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE )

property.name: sqlType
property.value: SQL

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select rownum numrowasdf, DATSTAT,VC2AREA,VC2ECNAME,VC2TYPE,VC2SVCNAME,VC2SERVCODE,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE,NUMSUBCNT,NUMCNT,NUMSUCCNT,NUMRATIO From ( SELECT concat('{0}', '~{1}') DATSTAT, VC2AREA, VC2ECNAME, VC2TYPE, VC2SVCNAME, VC2SERVCODE, VC2OPNAME, VC2SIGNTYPE, SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY VC2AREA,VC2ECNAME,VC2TYPE,VC2SVCNAME,VC2SERVCODE,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE ) Where rownum <={3} UNION ALL SELECT null numrowasdf, '汇总' DATSTAT, null VC2AREA, null VC2ECNAME, null VC2TYPE, null VC2SVCNAME, null VC2SERVCODE, null VC2OPNAME, null VC2SIGNTYPE, SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0#

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select Count(1) From ( SELECT concat('{0}', '~{1}') DATSTAT, VC2AREA, VC2ECNAME, VC2TYPE, VC2SVCNAME, VC2SERVCODE, VC2OPNAME, VC2SIGNTYPE, SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY VC2AREA,VC2ECNAME,VC2TYPE,VC2SVCNAME,VC2SERVCODE,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE )

property.name: sqlType
property.value: SQL

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select rownum numrowasdf, DATSTAT,VC2SVCNAME,VC2PUTIN,VC2BRANCHCOMPANY,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2ISBIGEC,VC2SERVCODE,NUMBW,NUMPFTYPE,NUMSUBCNT,NUMCNT,NUMSUCCNT,NUMRATIO From (SELECT TO_CHAR(DATSTAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATSTAT, VC2SVCNAME, VC2PUTIN, VC2BRANCHCOMPANY, VC2OPNAME, VC2SIGNTYPE, VC2ISBIGEC, VC2SERVCODE, CASE NUMPFTYPE WHEN 1 THEN '共享'||NUMBW ELSE ''||NUMBW END NUMBW, NUMPFTYPE, SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY DATSTAT, VC2SVCNAME,VC2PUTIN,VC2BRANCHCOMPANY,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2ISBIGEC,VC2SERVCODE,NUMBW,NUMPFTYPE ) Where rownum <={1} UNION ALL SELECT null numrowasdf, '汇总' DATSTAT, null VC2SVCNAME, null VC2PUTIN, null VC2BRANCHCOMPANY, null VC2OPNAME, null VC2SIGNTYPE, null VC2ISBIGEC, null VC2SERVCODE, null NUMBW, null NUMPFTYPE, SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0#

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select Count(1) From (SELECT TO_CHAR(DATSTAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATSTAT, VC2SVCNAME, VC2PUTIN, VC2BRANCHCOMPANY, VC2OPNAME, VC2SIGNTYPE, VC2ISBIGEC, VC2SERVCODE, CASE NUMPFTYPE WHEN 1 THEN '共享'||NUMBW ELSE ''||NUMBW END NUMBW, NUMPFTYPE, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY DATSTAT, VC2SVCNAME,VC2PUTIN,VC2BRANCHCOMPANY,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2ISBIGEC,VC2SERVCODE,NUMBW,NUMPFTYPE )

property.name: sqlType
property.value: SQL

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select rownum numrowasdf, DATSTAT,VC2SVCNAME,VC2PUTIN,VC2BRANCHCOMPANY,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2ISBIGEC,VC2SERVCODE,NUMBW,NUMPFTYPE,NUMSUBCNT,NUMCNT,NUMSUCCNT,NUMRATIO From (SELECT concat('{0}', '~{1}') DATSTAT, VC2SVCNAME, VC2PUTIN, VC2BRANCHCOMPANY, VC2OPNAME, VC2SIGNTYPE, VC2ISBIGEC, VC2SERVCODE, CASE NUMPFTYPE WHEN 1 THEN '共享'||NUMBW ELSE ''||NUMBW END NUMBW, NUMPFTYPE, SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY VC2SVCNAME,VC2PUTIN,VC2BRANCHCOMPANY,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2ISBIGEC,VC2SERVCODE,NUMBW,NUMPFTYPE ) Where rownum <={3} UNION ALL SELECT null numrowasdf, '汇总' DATSTAT, null VC2SVCNAME, null VC2PUTIN, null VC2BRANCHCOMPANY, null VC2OPNAME, null VC2SIGNTYPE, null VC2ISBIGEC, null VC2SERVCODE, null NUMBW, null NUMPFTYPE,SUM(NUMSUBCNT) NUMSUBCNT, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0#

property.name: SQL
property.value: Select Count(1) From (SELECT concat('{0}', '~{1}') DATSTAT, VC2SVCNAME, VC2PUTIN, VC2BRANCHCOMPANY, VC2OPNAME, VC2SIGNTYPE, VC2ISBIGEC, VC2SERVCODE, CASE NUMPFTYPE WHEN 1 THEN '共享'||NUMBW ELSE ''||NUMBW END NUMBW, NUMPFTYPE, SUM(NUMCNT) NUMCNT, SUM(NUMSUCCNT) NUMSUCCNT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(SUM(NUMCNT), 0, 0, ROUND(SUM(NUMSUCCNT) * 100 / SUM(NUMCNT), 1)),'990.9')||'%' NUMRATIO FROM TLV_STAT_MTINFO_SUMMARY Where 1=1 #0# GROUP BY VC2SVCNAME,VC2PUTIN,VC2BRANCHCOMPANY,VC2OPNAME,VC2SIGNTYPE,VC2ISBIGEC,VC2SERVCODE,NUMBW,NUMPFTYPE )
